00024 
00025 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00026 
00027 LUABIND_API std::string get_class_name(lua_State* L, type_id const& i);
00028 
00029 template <class T>
00030 struct type_to_string
00031 {
00032     static void get(lua_State* L)
00033     {
00034         lua_pushstring(L, get_class_name(L, typeid(T)).c_str());
00035     }
00036 };
00037 
00038 template <class T>
00039 struct type_to_string<T*>
00040 {
00041     static void get(lua_State* L)
00042     {
00043         type_to_string<T>::get(L);
00044         lua_pushstring(L, "*");
00045         lua_concat(L, 2);
00046     }
00047 };
00048 
00049 template <class T>
00050 struct type_to_string<T&>
00051 {
00052     static void get(lua_State* L)
00053     {
00054         type_to_string<T>::get(L);
00055         lua_pushstring(L, "&");
00056         lua_concat(L, 2);
00057     }
00058 };
00059 
00060 template <class T>
00061 struct type_to_string<T const>
00062 {
00063     static void get(lua_State* L)
00064     {
00065         type_to_string<T>::get(L);
00066         lua_pushstring(L, " const");
00067         lua_concat(L, 2);
00068     }
00069 };
00070 
00071 # define LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(x) \
00072     template <> \
00073     struct type_to_string<x> \
00074     { \
00075         static void get(lua_State* L) \
00076         { \
00077             lua_pushstring(L, #x); \
00078         } \
00079     };
00080 
00081 # define LUABIND_INTEGRAL_TYPE_TO_STRING(x) \
00082     LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(x) \
00083     LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(unsigned x)
00084 
00085 LUABIND_INTEGRAL_TYPE_TO_STRING(char)
00086 LUABIND_INTEGRAL_TYPE_TO_STRING(short)
00087 LUABIND_INTEGRAL_TYPE_TO_STRING(int)
00088 LUABIND_INTEGRAL_TYPE_TO_STRING(long)
00089 
00090 LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(void)
00091 LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(bool)
00092 LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(std::string)
00093 LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(lua_State)
00094 
00095 LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(luabind::object)
00096 LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING(luabind::argument)
00097 
00098 # undef LUABIND_INTEGRAL_TYPE_TO_STRING
00099 # undef LUABIND_TYPE_TO_STRING
00100 
00101 template <class Base>
00102 struct type_to_string<table<Base> >
00103 {
00104     static void get(lua_State* L)
00105     {
00106         lua_pushstring(L, "table");
00107     }
00108 };
00109 
00110 template <class End>
00111 void format_signature_aux(lua_State*, bool, End, End)
00112 {}
00113 
00114 template <class Iter, class End>
00115 void format_signature_aux(lua_State* L, bool first, Iter, End end)
00116 {
00117     if (!first)
00118         lua_pushstring(L, ",");
00119     type_to_string<typename Iter::type>::get(L);
00120     format_signature_aux(L, false, typename mpl::next<Iter>::type(), end);
00121 }
00122 
00123 template <class Signature>
00124 void format_signature(lua_State* L, char const* function, Signature)
00125 {
00126     typedef typename mpl::begin<Signature>::type first;
00127 
00128     type_to_string<typename first::type>::get(L);
00129 
00130     lua_pushstring(L, " ");
00131     lua_pushstring(L, function);
00132 
00133     lua_pushstring(L, "(");
00134     format_signature_aux(
00135         L
00136       , true
00137       , typename mpl::next<first>::type()
00138       , typename mpl::end<Signature>::type()
00139     );
00140     lua_pushstring(L, ")");
00141 
00142     lua_concat(L, static_cast<int>(mpl::size<Signature>()) * 2 + 2);
00143 }
00144 
00145 }} // namespace luabind::detail
